basics.name: Victor Santelé
basics.label: Student Unamur - Master in Computer Science with a specialization in Data Science
basics.summary: Master's student in Computer Science with a specialization in Data Science at UNamur. Aspiring Data Engineer

work.name: JetBrains Research
highlights: Created a graph to understand relationships between the different elements of the context
Reduced the context size by an average of 97% while maintaining the same performance
work.summary: Research internship as part of my master's in Computer Science at the University of Namur. I worked on improving the relevance of the context sent to an LLM to generate unit tests in the TestSpark plugin, reducing context size while preserving performance.

work.name: VSantelé
highlights: Improved a chatbot using an LLM + RAG
Optimized the performance of the permis-b.be website
Designed and implemented an API for looping.green
Automated invoice processing from email using Azure serverless
work.summary: Completed several contracts for various companies: business management, e-learning, image analysis, associations

work.name: SecondSquare
highlights: Generation of audio files using Azure Ai Speech
Creation of a chatbot to learn the Belgian driving license through promptflow
Management and indexing of data related to regulations and the theory of the Highway Code
Implementation of a feedback system to improve the relevance of responses
Integration of the chatbot into the website on the front-end (Angular) and back-end (Asp.Net)
work.summary: Adding features to the permis-b.be website, including the development of an intelligent chatbot using end-to-end Generative AI.

work.name: DatasPilot
highlights: Setting up the project to optimize the developer experience
Choosing the technical stack to optimize development time through the sharing of a unique template for different projects
Accelerating the processing time of invoices sent by suppliers from an email address using Azure Logic Apps, Azure Functions, and Azure Ai Document Intelligence.
Deploying applications on different VPSs using Docker
Securing VPSs
work.summary: Development of enterprise management, event management, and funeral home systems using NodeJs, NextJS, Prisma, Postgres, tRPC, Express, Typescript, Azure AI, and Azure Functions.

work.name: MIC - Meet Innovate Create
highlights: Creating a facial recognition authentication tool using Azure AI Vision
Automating a coffee machine using Azure IoT Central coupled with facial recognition to prepare the user's coffee when they arrive at the machine
Creating a demonstrator for extracting information from an image using Azure AI Vision and Azure Functions
work.summary: Creating several projects focusing on new technologies for technical demonstrations. Particularly on AI, IoT, and serverless using Azure services, TypeScript, and .NET.

work.name: MIC - Meet Innovate Create
highlights: Designing the user interface
Developing an optimization algorithm using data provided by the client
Optimizing the creation of plots in the application using cadastral data from the Walloon region
work.summary: Designing and implementing a Web tool for optimizing fields in permaculture using React, TS, Asp.Net, C#, MongoDB, Leaflet

projects.name: Adding AI to Looping
highlights: Training a model for classifying household waste images using Azure AI Vision
Integration of the model into the mobile application's API using Firebase

projects.name: A Vos Marques Prêts
highlights: Creation of a web application for managing sports session reservations
Collaboration with the ASBL team to meet expectations
Use of Svelte kit, tailwind, Typescript

projects.name: BeerMoji
projects.description: Android application for rating beers using an Emoji
highlights: Creating a mobile application
Using Flutter
Learning about the deployment of a mobile application
